Package pipeline

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
pipeline.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
A collection of utility functions for file I/O, matrix operations, clustering, and tree visualization.

      public Utils()

  • Method Details

    • printTree

      public static void printTree(TreeNode node, String prefix, boolean isTail)
      Recursively prints a tree structure starting from the given node.
      Parameters:
      node - The root node of the tree.
      prefix - A string prefix used for indentation.
      isTail - Whether this node is the last child (used for drawing lines).

    • readAdjClustResults

      public static int[][] readAdjClustResults(String filePath)
      Reads a file containing clustering results in adjacency format. Each line should be tab-separated and represent one clustering merge step. (.tsv file expected)
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to the TSV file.
      Returns:
      A 2D integer array representing the clustering steps.

    • getTreeDepth

      public static int getTreeDepth(TreeNode node)
      Calculates the depth of a binary tree.
      Parameters:
      node - The root node of the tree.
      Returns:
      The maximum depth of the tree.

    • readLDMatrix

      public static double[][] readLDMatrix(String filePath) throws IOException
      Reads a linkage disequilibrium (LD) matrix from a tab-separated file. Skips the header row and first column in each row. (number of genetic positions)
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to the input TSV file.
      Returns:
      A 2D double array representing the matrix.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during file reading.

    • writeMatrixToTSV

      public static void writeMatrixToTSV(double[][] matrix, String outputPath) throws IOException
      Writes a 2D double matrix to a TSV file with 6 decimal precision.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix to write.
      outputPath - Path to the output TSV file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during writing.

    • reorderMatrix

      public static double[][] reorderMatrix(double[][] matrix, int[] order)
      Reorders a square matrix based on a given order of row and column indices.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The original square matrix.
      order - The new order of indices.
      Returns:
      A reordered matrix according to the given order.

    • getSortedIndices

      public static int[] getSortedIndices(double[] values)
      Returns the indices that would sort a given array in ascending order.
      Parameters:
      values - The input array of doubles.
      Returns:
      An array of indices that would sort the input array.

    • getPlainIndices

      public static int[] getPlainIndices(String filePath) throws IOException
      Reads a TSV file containing numeric values and flattens them into a 1D array of integers. Used for loading plain index lists.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to the TSV file.
      Returns:
      An array of integers extracted from the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the file.
